description: The HpeProcessorMetricsExt object extends the properties of a CPU.

MemorySpareChannelPresence.description: The memory spare channel presence state.
MemorySpareChannelPresence.longDescription: This property shall indicate memory spare channel is presence for this processor.

EDPViolationStateType.longDescription: This property shall indicate EDP violation for this processor.

enumDescriptions.Normal: The value is within the range
enumDescriptions.OutOfRange: The value is outside the range

PerformanceState.longDescription: This property shall contain the performance state value for this resource.

enumDescriptions.Degraded: The entity is operating at a degraded functional level
enumDescriptions.Normal: The entity is operating at a full functional level at full speed
enumDescriptions.Throttled: The entity is operating at a full functional level at reduced speed

PowerBreakPerformanceState.longDescription: This property shall contain the power break performance state value for this resource.

enumDescriptions.Degraded: The entity is operating at a degraded functional level
enumDescriptions.Normal: The value is within the range
enumDescriptions.Throttled: The value is outside the range

PCIeConnectionLinksStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of PCIe connection link for this processor.

enumDescriptions.Connected: This channel between GPU and CPU is connected
enumDescriptions.Disconnected: This channel between GPU and CPU is not connected

title: #HpeProcessorMetricsExt.v1_0_0.HpeProcessorMetricsExt
